January 17, 2025 - Blue Diamond Growers is an agricultural cooperative and marketing organization that specializes in California almonds. Founded in 1910 as the California Almond Growers' Exchange, the organization claims to be the world's largest tree nut processing and marketing company.

Blue Diamond Growers is on a global mission to share the benefits of almonds with the world. Blue Diamond Growers is the world's largest almond processing and marketing company. We are the world’s leading almond brand, and we’re focused on building markets and creating new products to deliver ...

t: Blue Diamond Almonds | Global Ingredients Division
s: As California’s largest almond cooperative – representing more than 3,000 California growers – Blue Diamond Growers® is the food industry’s first choice for value-added almond ingredients.

t: About our Blue Diamond Cooperative | Blue Diamond Growers
s: The co-op’s vision is to deliver the benefits of almonds to the world by expanding the markets and innovative uses of our growers’ quality almonds around the globe. Blue Diamond offers a diverse portfolio of branded consumer products that can be found worldwide.
